original_title: Aitken spence Cargo Secures top honours at SLFFA National Logistics Awards 2024
original_body_lines: Aitken Spence Cargo (Pvt) Ltd of Aitken Spence Freight Sector secured first place winning the Gold Award in the “Freight Forwarders – Large Category” at the National Logistics Awards 2024 organised by the Sri Lanka Logistics & Freight Forwarders Association (SLFFA). This prestigious event recognising excellence and innovation honouring achievements in freight logistics was held on 23rd October 2024 at the Hotel Shangri-La Colombo.

National Logistics Awards (NLA) 2024 is the esteemed benchmark competition organised biennially by the Sri Lanka Logistics and Freight Forwarders’ Association (SLFFA), the apex body in the freight logistics industry, and is the foremost recognised platform in Sri Lanka honouring outstanding accomplishments in freight logistics. A distinguished panel of judges used quantitative and qualitative methods for comprehensive assessment of numerous criteria including Financial Performance and Service Portfolios, Professional Memberships, Awards & Recognitions, Corporate Social Responsibility, Sustainability Projects, Green initiatives, Ethical Practices & Policies, Innovations & New Products / Services introduced, Value-added Services provided, HR Policies and Practices, Occupational Health & Safety (OHS), Quality Certifications & Business Process improvements, appraising excellence across multiple areas.
